definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: The police report described, in horrifying detail, the nightmare that followed.
sentences.chinese: 警方卷宗描述了接下来发生的噩梦，令人战栗的细节。

sentences.english: We will explore this concept in the next section.
sentences.chinese: 我们在接下来的部分探究这个概念。

sentences.english: At the next meeting, there was a9)split in the club membership.
sentences.chinese: 在接下来的会议里，俱乐部成员之间出现了意见分歧。

sentences.english: It's a theme that we'll see coming up in many of the stories.
sentences.chinese: 在接下来的很多故事中，我们都可以看到这个主题。

sentences.english: I held my breath, not knowing what to expect.
sentences.chinese: 我屏住呼吸，不明白接下来会发生什么。

sentences.english: Next, you need to analyse the metrics.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，你需要分析这个矩阵。

sentences.english: The next generation of groupware tools focused on these communications problems.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的一代群件工具是以通信问题为重点的。

sentences.english: Berlusconi was taken to hospital with blood smeared over his face after a man hurled a small model of Milan cathedral at him at a political rally, police said on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，他脸带血渍，被送往了医院。

sentences.english: So that efficiency is something less than one, and we'd like to figure out what that is.
sentences.chinese: 因此效率肯定小于一，接下来解释这是为什么。

sentences.english: The next hip-hop dance move is to extend the right foot out.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的嘻哈舞步，是扩大了右脚。

sentences.english: The next step is to harvest the selected classes from the auto-generated class diagram.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的一步是从自动生产类图中总结选择的类。

sentences.english: Hello and welcome to Trend UK, your shortcut to popular culture from the British Council. In the next few minutes we’re going to be talking about modern manners.
sentences.chinese: 在接下来的几分钟里，我们将要讨论的是现代礼仪。

sentences.english: The next few months passed in a blur.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的几个月混混沌沌地过去。

sentences.english: Next, I build a state machine, step by step.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，我将逐步构建一个状态机。

sentences.english: Next I smudged the yellow to start forming the random sections of color where the gradient will go.
sentences.chinese: 接下来我对色彩发生随机渐变的部分进行模糊处理。

sentences.english: The following weeks went by in a whirl.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的几周飞一样的过去。

definition: to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
